questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and reflections
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A reflection of a pool and surrounding area on a building
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) A building's reflection
D) A busy street

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A swimming pool
B) A mountain
C) A busy street
D) A family gathering

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Ocean
C) Trees and other buildings
D) A playground

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A sandy beach
B) A city street
C) The glass facade of a building
D) A family picnic

What can be seen in the reflection on the building?
A) A forest
B) A swimming pool with lounge chairs
C) A highway
D) A family gathering

What is the relationship between the reflection and the building?
A) The reflection is of another building
B) The reflection is of a park
C) The reflection is of a swimming pool area
D) The reflection is of a mountain range

What type of structure is reflecting the image?
A) A wooden cabin
B) A glass skyscraper
C) A brick house
D) A metal shed

What is the shape of the pool in the reflection?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Irregular
D) Triangular

How many floors are visible in the building?
A) 1
B) 2
C) 3
D) More than 3

What is the color of the pool water in the reflection?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Red

What type of chairs are visible in the reflection?
A) Wooden chairs
B) Lounge chairs
C) Office chairs
D) Dining chairs

What is the primary material of the building reflecting the image?
A) Wood
B) Glass
C) Brick
D) Metal

What can be inferred about the height of the building in the photo?
A) It is a single-story building
B) It is a mid-rise building
C) It is a high-rise building
D) It is an underground building

What kind of environment surrounds the building?
A) Desert
B) Coastal
C) Urban
D) Rural

What is the architectural style of the building reflecting the image?
A) Traditional
B) Modern
C) Gothic
D) Baroque

How clear is the reflection in the building?
A) Very clear
B) Slightly distorted
C) Extremely blurry
D) Not visible

What is the condition of the pool area in the reflection?
A) Crowded
B) Empty
C) Under construction
D) Covered

What is the primary color of the building reflecting the image?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Yellow

What is the texture of the building's surface?
A) Smooth glass
B) Rough brick
C) Wooden panels
D) Metal sheets

What kind of outdoor furniture is visible in the reflection?
A) Benches
B) Lounge chairs and tables
C) Picnic tables
D) Hammocks

What is the orientation of the building in relation to the pool area?
A) Perpendicular
B) Parallel
C) At an angle
D) Directly above

What is the condition of the windows in the building reflecting the image?
A) Broken
B) Clean and intact
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Boarded up
